S

SERVER_ACCEPTJOIN - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used for accepting the client request to join the server and notify the client of the features that the server supports.
SERVER_BROADCASTLEADERBOARD - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to broadcast the leaderboard to the clients Arguments: - name = Name of the player - score = The score of the game - time = date and time when the game was played Note: This is done as often as needed.
SERVER_CHALLENGELIST - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to send the clients that support the challenge feature Direction: Server -> Client Example: Pittt request the challenge list.
SERVER_CONNECTIONLOST - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used when one client disconnects from the server.
SERVER_DENYJOIN - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to deny the client if the name is already in use.
SERVER_DENYMOVE - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to deny a move if the move is not valid.
SERVER_GAMEOVER - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to announce that the game is over Arguments: - name = Name of the client that won the game.
SERVER_INVALIDCOMMAND - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used everytime a client tries to perform an invalid command.
SERVER_MOVEREQUEST - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used by the server to let the client know that he has to do a move.
SERVER_NOTIFYCHALLENGE - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to notify the client that someone else is challenging him.
SERVER_NOTIFYMOVE - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to let the clients know that a move has been made.
SERVER_PUBLICKEY - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
 
SERVER_RESULTCHALLENGE - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to notify the other client whether the challenge has been accepted or not.
SERVER_SENDCHAT - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to broadcast the message to all the clients that support the chat feature.
SERVER_STARTGAME - Static variable in interface network.Protocol
Used to let the clients know that a game has been started.
ServerGame - Class in network
Class managing the game for a Server interaction with clients.
ServerGame(List<ServerPeer>) - Constructor for class network.ServerGame
 
ServerLobby - Class in network
Class managing how are started the game (by setting up lobbies).
ServerLobby() - Constructor for class network.ServerLobby
Constructor managing the distant users and lobbies.
ServerPeer - Class in network
This class for the connection of the client-server of the game.
ServerPeer(Socket, ServerLobby) - Constructor for class network.ServerPeer
 
ServerSession() - Constructor for class gui.Ringzz.ServerSession
 
ServerSession - Class in gui
This class for maintening the Server of the Ringgz game for playing in network.
ServerSession() - Constructor for class gui.ServerSession
Constructor of the ServerSession.
serverside() - Method in class network.ServerPeer
Manage command received in the server side.
setMove(int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class network.ClientGame
Update the board with a move received from the server.
setOpponents(String) - Method in class network.ServerPeer
Set opponents list.
shutdown() - Method in class network.ClientPeer
Closes the connection, the sockets will be terminated.
shutdown() - Method in class network.ServerPeer
 
SIZE - Static variable in class game.Board
 
SmartStrategy - Class in game.player
Manages the Smart AI.
SmartStrategy(int) - Constructor for class game.player.SmartStrategy
Constructor for RandomStrategy.
start() - Method in class gui.ServerSession
create Peer object and start the two-way communication.
start(ServerGame) - Method in class network.ServerPeer
Assign game to player.
startgame(String) - Method in class network.ServerPeer
 
Strategy - Interface in game.player
Interface managing the Strategies.
